headline: Why Nothing Can Stop MP Materials Stock, at Least for Now
summary: MP Materials  stock and shares of other rare-earth miners jumped again on Monday, extending last week’s rally after China tightened export controls on the minerals.  MP Materials stock rose 21.3% to $95.06, a record close.  Smaller rare-earth companies  USA Rare Earth  and  Ramaco Resources  rose 18.6% and 11.1%, respectively, after closing higher on Friday.

headline: These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Broadcom, MP Materials, Albemarle, Bloom Energy, Nvidia, Tesla, Fastenal, and More

headline: Does Albemarle’s Lithium Market Rally Signal a New Opportunity for Investors in 2025?
summary: If you've been paying attention to Albemarle lately, you're not alone in wondering whether it's time to hold, buy, or move on. Over the last month, the stock has surged 18.3%, an impressive rebound that’s caught the attention of both casual investors and dedicated followers. However, if you step back a bit further, the story looks very different. Year-to-date, the stock is only up 5.4%, and over the past three years, it has lost a staggering 62.2% of its value. Clearly, this is a company...
